channel.title: On the Knight and Trolls
channel.description:
The way Cold Steel works is designed to prevent trolling with it. However it makes it far too risky to be used on anyone besides confirmed Unseen. And those are always executed in the day or by Prince first.
However there is another problem that cold steel has: it doesn't truly solve the original problem, it just moves it from knight to everyone else. All you have to do is try and be obnoxious to the Knight and he will CS you and die. You could do this with both knights and the Prince all in the same game if you wanted.
So if that trolling potential is still there then why is the fix? It's not like there isn't precident for CS not suiciding. It's exactly what CC does for it's Vig equivalent.

Confirmability - Auto modconfirmed
Defence - Guards

Prince:

Confirmability - Guarenteed unconvertable unique. Imprison.
Leverage - Execute

Confirmability - Wolf
Defence - Bear
Leverage - Wolf

Butler:

Confirmability - Wine
Defence - Party
Leverage - Nightshade, Wine

Drunk:

Confirmability - Debauchery
Leverage - Debauchery

Court Wizard:
Confirmability - Tornado
Defence - Tornado

Physician:
Confirmability - Heal
Defence: Remedy Studies, Self care

Princess:
Confirmability - Flirt

Noble:
Confirmability - Basically Everything

Mystic:
Confirmability - Basically Everything
Leverage - Telepathy

Observer:
Confirmability - Follow

Paladin:
Defence: Smite

As you can see the only classes with absolutely no leadership potential are the sheriff and the Knight. However the Knights CS and Armored Ability’s can be reworked to solve this.

Sheriff could use some help here too, probably something bring his confirmability up to the level of Princess. I’m thinking that Targeted Seach Ability I’ve suggested before.

item.title: On the Knight and Trolls
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
In my mind everyone should have some kind of tool for encouraging claims to them. Things that qualify are:

Confirmability (people will claim to you if they know you are good)
Defence (You can push harder, longer and on more people if you can survive the kills it draws in)
Leverage (people will claim to you if not doing so carries risk)
